de.thkoeln.bibl.api.rfid.reader

Class ThreadedReader<T extends BaseTag>

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.thkoeln.bibl.api.rfid.reader.Reader<T>
      • de.thkoeln.bibl.api.rfid.reader.ThreadedReader<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of tags the reader can handle
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BRMReader, HostReader

    public abstract class ThreadedReader<T extends BaseTag>
extends Reader<T>
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Class adds threading support to the generic Reader. A ThreadedReader can starts a background process to perform reader tasks. The sub-class must implement the task logic. The thread handling is done by the ThreadedReader.

        public ThreadedReader(java.lang.Class<T> tagClass,
                      ReaderConnection con,
                      int cacheSize,
                      int readInterval)
        Initialize a new ThreadedReader.
        Parameters:
        tagClass - the tag class the reader handles
        con - the connection used to communicate with the reader
        cacheSize - the initial cache size for storing tags
        readInterval - the interval the reader will wait between performing read tasks
